originalText.text: I went to the salon today because I needed a cut badly. Diana was so kind and fit me in with Luz who was so thorough and gave me just what I asked for. Best blow out I’ve ever had. I’ll be back!

originalText.text:
Hello!

I just wanted to share my experience with Sheer hair salon.

Jessica was my stylist and was absolutely phenomenal. She took two hours just to do a cut, style and blow out.

I showed her exactly what I wanted in a picture and my hair looked exactly like the picture!

Not only was my stylist great but the entire time I was getting my hair done other stylists as well as the manager Diana and another stylist Elly, were constantly asking me how I’m doing and checking how the cut was going.

The environment was happy, the music was great and everyone was in good spirits.

Diana even gave me a consultation because she knew I was nervous about getting my hair done.

I have gotten my hair done so many times in my life and am EXTREMELY picky!! I have to say that this is the best haircut I have ever had.

I’m truly very happy with the whole team at Sheer hair salon, they work together to create a happy and content environment for their customers.

They really really care and take their time.

Jessica is a phenomenal stylist and really took her time with me.

Elly made me feel comfortable right when I walked in.

Diana as the manager is extremely professional and makes you feel welcome and taken care of.

BEST SALON EVER!!!!!

originalText.text: I will never go downtown for a cut and color again! This is an upscale salon that provides all the skill and comfort of a downtown shop at uptown prices!  I save at least $100 over what I was paying downtown & the results are just as nice or better. This is a welcome addition to the neighborhood. And he owner, Diana, has such a fun personality that she makes it an added pleasure to spend time at her salon. They offers threading and pedicures too.
